Jigen brings the members of [[Kara]] through portals to attack the opponent. Delta rushes flying at them, modifying her leg to stab them from above. Boro follows with a gunpowder-laced punch, both it and the explosion tossing the target aside towards Koji as he summons flames. The target is caught between the flames erupting below them and Jigen dropping a cube above them.
